description: Triangle T(n,k) (n >= 1, k >= 1) giving dimension of bigrading of Hopf algebra of rooted trees.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..141, flattened
D. J. Broadhurst and D. Kreimer, Towards cohomology of renormalization...
maple: with(numtheory): A81:= proc(n) option remember; `if`(n<2, n, (add(add(d*A81(d), d=divisors(j)) *A81(n-j), j=1..n-1))/ (n-1)) end: b:= proc(n) option remember; -`if`(n<0, 1, add(b(n-i) *A81(i+1), i=1..n+1)) end: B:= proc(n) add(b(i) *x^i, i=0..n) end: T:= (n,k)-> coeff(B(n)^k, x, n-k): seq(seq(T(n, k), k=1..n), n=1..13); # _Alois P. Heinz_, Oct 23 2009
mathematica: A81[n_] := A81[n] = If[n < 2, n, Sum[ Sum[ d*A81[d], {d, Divisors[j]} ] * A81[n-j], {j, 1, n-1}]/(n-1)]; b[n_] := b[n] = -If[n < 0, 1, Sum[ b[n-i]*A81[i+1], {i, 1, n+1}]]; B[n_] := Sum[ b[i]*x^i, {i, 0, n}]; T[n_, k_] := Coefficient[ B[n]^k, x, n-k]; Flatten[ Table[ T[n, k], {n, 1, 12}, {k, 1, n}]] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Jan 20 2012, translated from Alois P. Heinz's Maple program *)
crossrefs: First few columns give A051573, A051603, A052251, A052252.
Row sums give A000081(n+1). - _Alois P. Heinz_, Oct 23 2009
author: _David Broadhurst_, Feb 05 2000
extensions: More terms from _Alois P. Heinz_, Oct 23 2009
